p: Total amount of the phenolic components was determined by Folin-Ciocalteau method. One mL of methanolic extract (5 mg/mL in acetone-water solution) was mixed with 200 ÂµL of Folin-Ciocalteau reagent and 1 mL of 2% Na 2CO 3, and the new solution was incubated for 30 min at room temperature. Then the absorbance was determined at 750 nm using Thermo Fisher spectrophotometer. Various concentrations of gallic acid were utilized as the standard, and control samples did not contain any extract. All evaluations were performed in triplicate.
